fecb8a03-38a1-4f00-bbd1-470b434032a1.name: Kirsty
notes: Had another lesson with Kirsty. We looked at some popular stuff like "Landslide" by Fleetwood Mac. We're doing "Hallelujah". We looked at breathing and some twang.

2d026658-0bf0-459b-b37b-9f106738cc21.name: John
notes: Had another lesson with John. We looked at the Roy Orbison Song Crying. Voice improving, breathing getting stronger, needs to work on posture next. A little bit of anchoring would also do a world of good.
Had another lesson with John. His posture is improving. Stomach's still a little bit tight.

e01c8e8c-fe81-45f4-89b4-9c1f7d553cce.name: Phil
notes: Phil is a 25-year-old bricklayer who wants to learn to sing as a hobby. He's really into Counting Crows. His top note is currently E-flat. We focused on breathing and the usual first lesson stuff. Next time I want to focus a little bit more on twang.
He also really wants to be a part of the concert at the end of the year, so I need to make sure I save a slot for him.
